name: My Part Time Lover
description:
After receiving  a message from your uncle,  you make your way to Milton Town.
You have been asked to take care of his property for 30 days until he returns.

What will become of your stay?

------
Download contains My Part Time Lover.zip - Please unzip the  folder before playing!

Comes with a Wallpaper in the game file.

A dating game made  with RPG MAKER MV.
For WINDOWS only!

(18+) Please note, this story contains explicit scenes and is for adult only!
